values:
The death of this journal follows the death of what represented the day this journal was named after. It is over.

OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.
OVER.

You have made it this way. This is what you wanted.
Now we will both live with the decisions we have made.
Goodbye.

Those of you who read this will be informed of the new one.

my days in rome are coming to an end and the adventure in turin is just about to begin. i have waited too long for this.

i am home.
and i wont leave.

this is me not wishing you happy birthday.
this is me remembering how we got to know each other a few days after your 19th birthday.
this is me saying goodbye.
its only right that i do it today.

Last night I got taken out by 2 strangers I have just met, and realized that it has been so long since I have hung out with real genuine people. We sat at the piazza and drank beer and talked about life.

3 perfect strangers sitting at the piazza consuming ridiculous amounts of belgium beer. It was nice. 

I have to remind myself to stop drinking beer. It does not go well with my system. 

Tomorrow morning I leave on a 7 hour train journey up North to go see the kids and stay with them for 2 weeks. I miss them so much. 

I am okay. I got some perspective thinking done. No more dwelling on things I have no control over. This journal will soon cease to end for its chapter in my life has finished. 

When the whole adventure with school starts and being in a town I have never been before begins I will get the new journal. 

I am still sad its just that.. There is nothing I can do. And I am okay with that. This year has been hard because I have cut off so many people from my life all because there is nothing I can do about certain situations. I have had enough of going out of my way trying to preserve friendships that do not deserve it. 

I guess its life. And I guess when you are 20 you start your real life adventure. You let go being a child and start being an adult, or at least try to. I know good things are ahead, and with a little hope, and a little bit of faith, everything is possible.

My heart always has an open door. My heart is big. And it can tolerate alot. It suffers, but only because it cares and I realized I am lucky that I have not frozen up, that I still feel. 

Because sometimes having heart, is the most important thing a person can have.

I am severely hurting. I have not felt hurt this bad in a long time. The kind of hurt that I need to bleed, the kind of hurt I need to punch walls. The kind of hurt I feel my insides perishing. My aunt took me shopping today. She saw me and she was like.. something isnt right. No kidding. Try getting your heart broken.

I guess part of me just wanted her to say yes so badly I did not think what would happen if she said no. And when she did, when the words "Its over for me" came sinking in, I cried a solid hour. I have not cried in a long time. Anger replaces tears. I cried today. I put my Damien Rice cd. And I cried some more. Because I really do love that girl, probably the most realistic kind of love I have ever felt. "I am sorry but I do not feel the same way for" "At least I am being honest with you". 


Yeah.. honesty goes a long way. How did it come to this? What was I expecting? It was like diving off a cliff without a parachute. 

I do not know where to go from here. It is time to just let go of everything I have ever known. It is time to start a new life, a fresh new start, with my new broken heart. I know good things will come in time. I know that. But I have never been so good with loneliness and melancholy. I fear of the things I can do when it comes to this. 

She was... the long awaited smile. A sight to see. The girl in jeans, with a betty shirt and her black jacket at the history section of the book shop. When my hand touched hers, I began to quiver. It was so intense. She took me home, and she kissed me. We stayed in bed all morning even though she had to be at work and I remember her smile that morning as it was the most beautiful thing I had ever seen. Goodbye princess, you were one of a kind.

Monday I am leaving for up North and will only be back in Rome for September. 


I put my heart out in the universe only to have it returned once again broken. I guess to some people, 14 months mean nothing. I guess, deep down inside I knew she never loved me, at least not the way I love her. I guess, enough is enough and when it is over, it is over. Because I realize now, it her loss. No longer mine.

So the heart broken, returned will be bigger once healed. And who ever will win it next will get the best of me.

For now. Enough. School starts October 17 and I cannot wait.

Gray, quiet and tired and mean Picking at a worried seam Itry to make you mad at me over the phone. Red eyes and fire and signs I'm taken by a nursery rhyme I want to make a ray of sunshine and never leave home No amount of coffee, no amount of crying No amount of whiskey, no amount of wine No, nothing else will do I've gotta have you, I've gotta have you. The road gets cold, there's no spring in the middle this year I'm the new chicken clucking open hearts and ears Oh, such a prima donna, sorry for myself But green, it is also summer And I won't be warm till I'm lying in your arms I see it all through a telescope: guitar, suitcase, and a warm coat Lying in the back of the blue boat, humming a tune...

I have just read my whole journal and I have come to the conclusion that I am just a pathetic piece of space. And that I was not always like this. And this is definately not who I want to be. I am so much better than that. And if you really knew me, you would know that because you would know my heart and my soul and the purity of it. And not the corrupted infected waste of space I have become. 

Now. I broke up with my girlfriend because it was the right thing to do. Because she had to sort her problems, because I could not carry the weight of her broken heart. If she wants to run away from it again, and start another relationship and get someone else to fall in love with her and live a lie. And that person will get hurt, she will end up in the same place as she was with me. Except I dont know how many people will tolerate having your gf in your arms and as she sleeps calling out the name of her ex. 

Enough. You want to know the truth? I still love you with every bit of my heart and I would do anything to have you back. But not until you let her go. Because I am seconds away from giving you my everything, to letting go everyone else so that you and I can have a future but for now you dont deserve that.

I am better than that and I will stop hurting.

Because you cannot know how it may hurt.
Because you will not know.
Because I am better than this.
Because I have come a long way and I will not go back to that dark corner.
I will not let you consume me dear anger, dear rage, dear hurt.
I will not let you consume.

Dear you,
You have just come online. I am staring at your user name, having a conversation with myself. I would not even know what to say to you. I would not want to know what you would have to say to me. Is that not strange? How I wish I could see you but in reality I would stand frozen in front of you with a thousand thoughts running through my head. There you are. Say something to me. Anything. I am just scared. Do not ask me of what for I do not know the answer. The pinch became a bruise and now it is a scar and I realize it is too late to take it all back even though I would not dream of taking it back. Because it is all true. These feelings for you. Which I am trying so very hard to forget, to let go because they do not make sense. And all I do is embarass myself. But I cannot stop them, it is a force stronger than me. And I am weak. I am weakened. By you and all that you are and all that I think you are. But the truth is, I do not even know what your favourite colour is, nor your favourite food. Truth is, I know nothing about you. I have been told not to communicate with you, to just let you be. And I am trying so very hard. I am trying so very hard. And even though I am dying just to say hello in the hope that there is a chance you would respond and we would have a nonsensical conversation, I will not. I will sit here, with my stomach in a twist, my heart in my throat and my feet nervously shaking. I will sit here. Trying to breathe. So I will sit here, listening to Rachel Yamagata telling me how everybody is saying I cannot be your love but I want to be your love. Because if I could take you away, and pretend I was Queen I wonder what you would say. 

Want to be your everything
Everything...
Everything's falling, and I am included in that
Oh, how I try to be just okay
Yeah, but all I ever really wanted
Was a little piece of you

Everything will be alright.

Its Turin.
Its Advertising(Art Director+Copywriting) specialization in Poster Design and printing.
Its this October.
Its settled.
Getting my own apartment.
Getting my own space.
Another few hundred km from what has now become home.
Rome has become home.
And its time to leave already.
I have to leave Alyson.
I called her yesterday and she was kind sad about it with our new found friendship. And I was like Ill come see you one of these days and she was like yeah well you better since you are leaving me. And I was like when do you start school? And she was like Ill start school when I feel like starting school. So I was like.. do you want to come help me settle up north and she was like... you shouldnt even be asking me that, you know im coming.

Sigh.
Who needs relationships?
Their just so drama.

im ok.
im always ok.
its fine.
its absolutely fine.
yeah.
so totally over it.
over her.
yeah.
totally.

===
I may say it was your fault 
Cause I know you could have done more 

Oh you're so naive yet so 

How could this be done 
By such a smiling sweetheart 
Oh and your sweet and pretty face 
In such an ugly way something so beautiful 
Everytime I look inside 

I know that she knows that I'm not fond of asking 
True or false it may be 
She's still out to get me

hello friend
hello lover
its nice to hear from you
so i see youve got someone new
yeah im happy
im happy for you
it was so easy to let go
it was just so easy to move on
already screwing some other girl
hello friend
hello lover
how is it?
are her lips softer?
does she taste sweeter?
14 months mean nothing
14 months and nothing
i cant breathe here
i cant hear you
i dont want to hear you
someone tell me what to do when the stars begin to fall

you and i were something
and now we are nothing

you and i were something
and now we are nothing

i could laugh in your face
but i turn and let my tears fall
do you not miss me the way i miss you?
as i fall deeper into the darkness
i ask myself just one thing.
did it all just mean nothing to you.
hello friend
hello lover
ps. it was nice to hear from you
there something you should know
i love you.
bury me.

In the confinements of my heart, doubt consumes me.
The fear of being broken or the fear of being alone.
Which is worse?
Time, what is time?
Every second so special.
Every moment forgotten.
I see her eyes.
I feel her skin.
Two simple kisses on the cheek.
This will go no where.
Please take me somewhere.
Away from you.
Away from me.
Away from everything.
Cant seem to stop running.
Cant seem to stop hiding.
Falling.
Falling.
Holding on.
What a mess.
Tangled between bed sheets and her thighs.
Where are you?
Bitter heart, sweet heart, whats the difference these days.
Alone in my own defeat.
My days pass me by.
Summer is almost over.
Its getting cold.

Damn it.
I thought I could get away without my mind and internal organs noticing but sadly my conscious has led me back here. There is one girl I did not mention. But I did not do it on purpose, and it would be wrong to put her with the others because I dont know.

Its just that I met her 3 years ago, tried to get to know her, failed, fast forward 2 years, find out shes my then gf best friend, who just happened to also be her ex gf, i mean things could not have been worse.

fast forward a few months, throw in some jealousy, one night of drunkeness and realization, followed by dancing and a lapdance. horror and nightmare yet evoking and appetizing and i dont know.

i dont know. i went and wrote a frikking book trying to figure out. i just need to get to know her. cant let it go otherwise. she just needs to say yes and i will do the rest.

OH MY DAYS!
People of the world how are you?
Life is fantastic. Its extraordinary, its wonderful.
I can taste the freedom in the air.
I love the smell of the air here.
Its beautiful.
Beautiful smelling air.

Work starts next monday. 
2-3 weeks in rome. then 2 weeks on the boat in sardegna, then a few weeks at a beach in tuscany.. its a wonderful job.

and oh my days what a story.
the mother of the kids had an affair with the upstairs neighbour, and his wife and her husband eventually found out. so they both left their families to live together. the kids are 3 and 5 and they dont know. so the mom stays in the house til 10 at night goes to her lover and returns at 6am before the kids wake up. and shes so torn between choosing the love of her life or her family. so not only have i become nanny to the kids ill also be emotional support for both parents - now i dont know how these situations follow me around but hey, im loving it.

i pity the husband. hes so broken and fragile. and the mom is really hot. sigh. so she has til september to decide.

moral of the story : YOU DO NOT GET MARRIED UNLESS YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY CERTAIN THAT YOURE MARRYING THE LOVE OF YOUR LIFE AND THAT NO OTHER COULD EVER REPLACE HIM. hint.

Tomorrow a friend of my ex is going to be coming to see me in Rome and she"ll be spending a few days here with me. Im so excited because i finally have someone to go out with at night and check out the hot spots.

My cousin is hot.

Hmmm.
Anyways. Besides my little outbursts of insanity here and there... Im trying to forget everything Ive left behind. But sometimes its not that easy. But im ok- im happy and im free.

What more should I ask for?

"Maybe we accept the dream has become a nightmare. We tell ourselves that reality is better. We convince ourselves it's better that we never dream at all. But, the strongest of us, the most determined of us, holds on to the dream or we find ourselves faced with a fresh dream we never considered. We wake to find ourselves, against all odds, feeling hopeful. And, if we're lucky, we realize in the face of everything, in the face of life the true dream is being able to dream at all."

Rome in 8 days.




Just 8 more days.

where ever i go, i will come across a broken heart.
one that needs melding.

i'm starting to think i should consider this as career.
it makes me feel better, and helps my broken heart.

I've been hanging out with 28 year olds.
Talking with 28 year olds.

Their a whole different species I must say.
I got called little baby today. I'm 20. I'm not 10. 
Oh well. I guess 20 to them was well actually is a decade away.

Maybe all my father's psychological talk is getting to me.
Maybe I'm slightly more open to be in a male-female relationship.

But not anytime soon.
God I hope I'm not getting into ANY sort of relationship anytime soon.
I've got some rocks to turn over.

I'm going to fly kites and let them whisk me wherever the wind takes me.

Could one really find happiness without having to look for it?

The days pass by fast here. The sun rises at 5am. By 9am you feel like it's noon. 

I can't wait to arrive in Italy. Just 10 more days and a whole new world of possibilities and adventures await me.

Will I play soccer? Get a chance at Nationals?
Will I study in Milan? Or will I end up in Barcelona?
Am I going to find love? Or is love going to find me?
Will I have a roof on my head?
Will I live the life I always hoped and imagined?
Will I be free from my past?
Will I be ready for the future?
Will I find peace?
Better. Stronger. Faster.

Life, I am ready for you.
Take me.

5th march 2006 i decided to think and do something right for once for myself.

10th may 2007 i once again had to make a decision.

whether it is right or wrong, i am not sure.
i just know that right now, it's what i need.

life starts today. on my own two feet.
no one to catch me if i fall.

it's time to get rid of the excess baggage.
it's time to forget the forgotten promises of others.
it's time to let go of the things i don't like but i clinged on to for the sake's of others.

it's time for me.
it's time to organize my life.

i don't want to be the same mess i am and have been when im 25.
i want to have my feet firmly on the ground.
with a destination set and with goals accomplished.

it's time.

and if everything means nothing..
then the battle is lost.

a new addiction.
another quick fix.
will it bring me up or will it take me down.
it's always a gamble.

but it's the latest drug.
to keep me numb.

learning to breathe.
on my own.

its like walking on ice
and half way out
the sun is burning and the ice is melting
if you go back
the ice is weaker as you've already crossed it once
the only thing left to do
is to keep going forward
and hope for the best

- 

i just found the coolest job at the highest price and i hope to god i get it because it would resolve so many things the only catch is the woman's name is... you've guessed it. but for that kind of money.. you could be named ishitmyselfagain and i'd work for you. cross fingers.

-

I bought 3 singlets for 10 dollars. 

-

My Little Ponies arrive Thursday morning at 4am along with my brother!!! Bunnies are cool too.

-

I got cool conditioner today to hence the brown in my hair. It's sparkly and rich in brown and gold hues. I like...

-

I think the ideas I've come up with are pretty good for the scholarship. If I actually get I won't believe it. I'm a bit worried. I don't like having that pressure knowing I have to HAVE TO do well or bye bye scholarship. But hey... 

-

Oooh life According To Jim.. Gotta go!

- Dear God,
I want a Bunny ;)
xox

I've never been so stuffed with cake in my life. And not just one kind of cake.. about 4. Haha.

CAKE.

Did you know Ashley Simpson's full name is Ashley Nicole Simpson? She has the same name as Ashley and she looks like.. well I know who. How crazy is that.  

I love Jake Gyllenhall. I can't believe he's with Witherspoon. I don't like Witherspoon. And Biel and Timberlake what's up with that? 

Gyllenhall and Johansson should be together. Now that would kick JoliePitt's ass. Those 2 want 8 kids. Just because they've got all the money in the world. 

Yeah.. cake.. 
I just washed my hair in the sink.. Too much blood in my head I think.

THAT RHYMES!

So I'm applying for scholarship at this school in Italy and it seems pretty cool. Now I can't seem to figure out what I want to major in.

Graphic Design
Advertising
Advertising specializing in Copywriting
Advertising specializing in Art Direction

I thought of Marketing and Communication but then I saw all these Math classes and decided to forget about it because we all know it is not my forte!

Still not giving up on football and a matter of other things that pretty much are all driving me insane.

Sigh. 

I've been reading the L Word recaps for season 4 and they make me so nostalgic. You know one thing I've learned throughout these years is how to block out people who hurt me. Yet there are days or moments where a thought comes to mind. And it shakes your entire being and knocks you out of your comfort zone until you find your equilibrium. Such is life I pressume.

I made apple tarts today. They didn't come out pretty because the pastry shrunk a bit but their definately finger licking good.

I need sex.

Veronika came to get me last night where we went to watch this Russian movie and it was part porn and part violence with a very cute love story in between and considering I understand what the hell they talked about I enjoyed it I must say lol..

Then we went to get pizza and have tea because the temperature dropped by 10 degrees and we nearly froze our knickers off.

Then we decided to go to Irish Pub where she had a beer and I had a bottle of wine. We talked and talked and talked. I miss talking to people face to face. So that was nice. 

Next week we're going shopping. Weeee.
Happy Easter!

sitting in the dark
the winds howling
it's raining cats and dogs
and having the scientist on repeat doesn't help
certain flashbacks that can't be helped
certain memories forgotten have returned
missing 
wondering
words overflooding my mind
i need my medicines
i cant have my medicines
finding comfort
finding peace
in something else
it's cold
i'm tired
if only i could see
what it is that you're thinking
besides all this blahness
my brother is coming next week and i can't wait because i miss that bugger more than anything!
we'll have fun together
going fishing
mushroom picking
and then dad's giving us this plot of land to plant whatever we want to plant
we'll feed the bull
go horseriding
play soccer
chase the sheeps
bake strawberry and apple tarts
yay

it was on the rotating eyes
it was all on the same postcard
it was all on the same damn shirt
said to sleep in the same Sear's camp house
it was all in the great state parks
it was all on the same Greyhound
it was all so many miles
beneath the dirty brown dirt
twenty miles down the islands
the biggest mall on Earth
it was all in the same rest stop
it was wall on the same damn shirt
it was all on the same Greyhound
sunspots
in the house of the late scapegoat
be aware the paint's still peeling
all muscle cars made of lead
I got myself a fine fine fine fine friend
it was all in the next gray ghost
it was all in the same damn place
the parts to pound attractive
your feeling you owe on your size is bleeding
sunspots

one minute i'm in a serene state of mind
the next its all shit
then comes the confusion
and the questions that dont have answers
and all these uncertainties
i guess some thing's don't change
some things just stay imprinted forever
and there's nothing that can be done about it

You know those days where the sky is a little more grey than usual... the days it's a little colder than usual.. the days you feel so alone you want to scream.. the days you feel so sad you just want hide under a blanket and cry.. the days you just need someone, anyone to hold you even if for a little while just to know everything will be alright.. the days the bottle and the blade want to be your best friends because you know they'd never let you down.. the days the heart feels heavy as it aches.. it's one of those days.

she looked up at the stars
as tears rolled down her face
she couldn't bare to sleep
in the search to find herself
to find the broken pieces
to fill in the holes within her soul
it wasn't always like this
and if everything has to be a battle
you have to do
what you have to do
put your armour on
and stand strong
anything to feel like you belong
the sun may not always shine
but look up at the sky
and i'll be there
look up at the sky
and you will find the light
you'll feel like you belong
tell me what it is that you seek
what it is that you need
nothing is lost
it's just lost in time
i've been there before.

the clearer i see the path i want to take
the more i realize it's the people i love most
that i will lose

our worlds are too different

i'm starting to become numb
i'm starting to not feel anymore
because no matter what
someone will get hurt

and now, the one person who i believed in
the one good person i still had faith in
has betrayed me

enough

I got birthday wishes from Ashley and Christina.
I didn't expect it. Especially not from Ashley but she remembered.. :) Seems like this year is going to be a good one and the only problem I'll have is my family. 

It's just so hard to let go of that image of us has a happy family. Ever since my dad got transferred everything turned upside down and all I have is vague recollections of when I was 5-6 years old where we were happy. Truly happy. 

I just want things to go back the way they were. As the years are passing both cultures and religions keep clashing, the money problem isn't helping and neither is being divided. But when my mom and dad are in the same country let alone under the same roof all hell breaks loose. 

All I've ever wanted was just to be a part of a normal family, lead a normal life and just be content. I just need a little bit of tranquility and stability. That is all.

You know, I get so fucking sick and tired of people labelling me just because I'm half white and half asian. I'm so sick of being put under catergories just because my mother is of royal blood and my father is white. 

They can't stand each other now for those facts because my father won't accept my mother's princess lifestyle and my mother won't stop calling my father a farmer because he comes from a small town with no royal blood.

I wish they both just stuffed socks in their mouths and shut up and quit trying to drag us into this. I associate myself more with my european side because it's less repressed, less pretentious and because I have only happy memories of Italy. I hate that we moved. Everything changed, and everything went wrong. 

Sure there are few things I'm thankful for... but still. Ever since I moved, I changed so much. I use to be the happiest kid in the world who didn't have a care in the world. I like wearing pretty dresses and danced about has if no one was watching. Now I'm a total mess, a time bomb waiting to explode, closed up within the cages of my heart because I fear hurting someone or being rejected. I can barely speak my mind without having some sort of anxiety attack.

The past 13 years in KL have destroyed me. And everytime I try to recollect the pieces something else happens. No one gets this. And I wish sometimes everyone left me alone and stopped asking questions. I wish I could erase so many dreadful memories that just haunt me at night when I can't sleep. I just want to move forward. I don't want to look back anymore. I just want to let go and be free. 

Great my nose is bleeding.

I'm so upset for having lost my voodoo bunny collection with all the taglines... I've been trying to remember them but I just can't seem to.

I wrote another song during the weekend.

I had a decent birthday. My baby just got the 18 roses I got delivered to her office for our one year anniversary today :D

My dad got me flowers for my birthday. So did his friend. And her daughter got me a shirt. The medicine I'm taking is making me bleuch. I'm pretty much house bound for the next few weeks not to mention my period is coming. Trying to see if we can go to the mountains this weekend so I can go horse riding. It's been too long. I can't wait.

I think very soon I'm going to declare myself orphan. I can't wait to go to Italy and just start my life. I can't wait. I can't wait to play football, I can't wait to go to school, I can't wait to live my life the way I see fit without anyone coming along and making a mess of things. I just want tranquility and stability. 

Tranquility and stability.

happy birthday to me
happy birthday to me
happy birthday to meeeeee
happy birthday to me

tomorrow my baby will get a surprise.

I'm so fucking EXCITED.
I'm so fucking EXCITED.
I'm so fucking EXCITED.

Oooh and today daddy and I are going to go buy my brother a suit! 

I'm overfilled with joy and I can't share it with anyone.
Not just yet...

I can see it in my head.
Every little detail...

I get weirdest dreams sometimes.
I'm so glad my real life isn't even half as complicated as my dream my life. I get the strangest people popping up in my dreams. Last night I had a high school flashback. It involved the seaside, fancy hotel, and swimming out to sea in search of something or someone, then a detailed high speed chase in some fancy cars. Strange strange strange.

I woke up and tried to call my baby but some woman kept talking in Russian. Sometimes the phone picks up other people's conversations. So I text her and tell her to go on gmail. She said she couldn't since she was already home. So I sat here wondering... why is she home at 2pm? Then I was thinking, maybe being buddy buddy with her boss is doing some good despite making me go hysterical. And she was like.. umm.. because.. it's.. SATURDAY. Oh.. yeah huh. Whhoooppss. I don't even know where the days go here.. It's been a month already since I've left.

So yesterday my friend Marina, from Malaysia took me to the ballet with her daughter and her brother.. We watched the Hunchback of Notre Dame. It was super duper beautiful. And heart wrenching.. and the costumes were extravagant full of vibrant colours.. and you really felt sad Esmerelda. 

Marina is going to be bringing back some things for me to pass to my baby and my mom. The most amusing thing happened to me yesterday despite the madness.

So I've been prescribed these herbal tranquilizers because my liver and digestive system really cannot take anymore stress or emotional anxiety and yesterday since I was fuming with anger I thought I'd give it a try. I popped these 2 green pills and suddenly the world was all colourful and pretty. Even when I was upset with my girlfriend I went out and got her a few little presents here and there. I think their made of grass or something.. I was all smiley and la la la la smurf like happy. I like those pills.

I'm so picky when I buy things... So I got her 3 little gifts of different things hoping that at least she'll like one. I was hoping to fly her to Italy this year but she's barely got any leave left.

With every gift I always have to outdo the last.. It's how I work. I love wrapping. I love going to wrapping shops. My favourite is Russ in One Utama. They always please me. 

I'm so excited... I can't wait... <3333 One day to my birthday, two days to our anniversary!!!
<3

and she may hurt you with her wicked ways but the sun will keep shining with the wind that caresses your skin it'll take away the broken pieces as her voice will fade away along with the sunset in your my mind she's no longer real all those feelings sealed just with a click of a button erasing what was real and she may hurt you in her wicked ways but your heart has been made of steel just with a click of a button she's erased something real the heart has its seasons and desire is its crop winters fade and spring will bloom all you ever wanted was to see her world all your ever needed was... hush... be still my heart hush... don't cry now hush... be still my heart she spoke words you couldn't hear you spoke words she couldn't feel season's come and season's go she may hurt you with her wicked ways but the sun will always shine as the wind blows and caresses your skin may she fade away fade away

Sad, and tragic yet had profound meaning to the word true friendship.

Today I got rather PISSED mad... I haven't been pissed mad in a long time. I ended up walking out of the internet cafe in the -20 weather, walked about for 20m and realized I couldn't feel my face so hopped in a cab home even if it was like 200m away.

At dinner had some good wine and port and let go of today's events. 


good night.

My mother use to tell me that friendships come and go. But I guess inside, I always hoped that some would last forever. 

There are few people who I hold so dear to heart. These are people that have always accepted for who I am and who have always been there for me over the years. There are a few who were there for me for my toughest times and there are a few who were with me for my happiest times.

And then there are the friends you've known your whole life, and you know that even if years pass by, you could see them tomorrow and nothing changes.

But there's always been one friend who I hold to the highest of regards. I even think of her as my other half because I barely function without her. People use to say we were joint at the hip. We grew up together. We did everything together. Her family was like my extended family. We spent hours on the phone studying for our O Level history paper and we both walked away with A's. When she got locked out of her house at 5am I went to get her in a cab even though I had a soccer tournament and had to be up by 6am. When I had stomach cramps and couldn't move she went to get me painkillers. When I needed someone to be there for me, she'd come pick me up and let me stay over where then she'd make instant mash potatoes and fry up some sausages. When she needed to throw up I helped her get to the hotel toilet. When I needed to throw up she slapped my face so I wouldn't make a scene at the restaurant. I was the idealistic, she was the realistic. Ying and Yang. Salt and pepper. Tea and milk. We're growing up. We're growing apart and I feel like I'm losing, or maybe I've already lost the most important person in my life. My best friend. Fi. 

We live in 2 separate worlds now. Even our ideals are different I think. I don't know. I just miss her. I really really miss her that I think when I do go to Italy I might fly up to Manchester to surprise her. Because that's what best friends do. Even when you fight, one will stand forth and do everything that it takes to save the friendship. I know I would do anything to save this friendship, and I mean anything. Besides Kara, she was first person I told about not being straight and she was so ok with it and stuck by me through my hardest days of highschool. When everyone bitched about me she stuck by me. Friendships like that don't just get lost. 

We are one. We always use to say.
I miss the summer we went driving around and blasting The Killers  and Kelly Clarkson and singing at the top of our lungs.

Those were the days.

At the end of the day, there are some things you just can't help but talk about. Some things we just don't want to hear, and some things we say because we can't be silent any longer. Some things are more than what you say, they're what you do. Some things you say cause there's no other choice. Some things you keep to yourself. And not too often, but every now and then, some things simply speak for themselves. 

people come.
people go.
feelings last.
feelings fade.
promises broken.
promises kept.
truths.
lies.

I should be happy with the way things are. I just realized what utter deep shit it would be if no name person actually told me she felt the same. Sheesh. Could you imagine how dirty and messy this would get? The drama and hurt it would create. No no no. Mustn't happen. Won't happen anyways thus I abolish this feelings. I Princess Pokka Dotta Puhdding abolish these feelings from my kingdom.

Yes. It must end now.
Now you hear me.
NOW.

Iannis: When you fall in love, it is a temporary madness. It erupts like an earthquake, and then it subsides. And when it subsides, you have to make a decision. You have to work out whether your roots are become so entwined together that it is inconceivable that you should ever part. Because this is what love is. Love is not breathlessness, it is not excitement, it is not the desire to mate every second of the day. It is not lying awake at night imagining that he is kissing every part of your body. No... don't blush. I am telling you some truths. For that is just being in love; which any of us can convince ourselves we are. Love itself is what is left over, when being in love has burned away. Doesn't sound very exciting, does it? But it is! Pelagia: I wrote to you every day. A hundred letters... and not a single reply. Mandras: [takes out her letters from his coat] I never learned... to read or write. Iannis: [writing to Corelli] Antonio, I do not know if this letter will reach you, or even if you are alive. Perhaps someone else sent your record, and that is why we found no note. I would like to say that Pelagia is happy, but she is full of tears she will not let fall, and of a grief no doctor can mend. She blames herself for the pain we have suffered, and perhaps the same is true for you. You know I am not a religious man, but I believe this: if there is a wound, we must try to heal it. If there is someone whose pain we can cure, we must search till we find them. If the gods have chosen that we should survive, it will be for a reason. Pelagia: Why did you save him? Why didn't you leave him to die? Mandras: I wanted you to love me again. [Pulls out 100 letters] Mandras: In Albania, I made them read every one of these to me... 'Mandras, I love you,' 'Mandras, I want you,' 'Mandras, when are you coming back?' And then one day, a different letter. 'I don't know how to describe my feelings. It's as if I have been waiting a hundred years to hear from you, waiting a hundred years for you to return. Once, my heart was overflowing with love for you, but now all I feel is emptiness. And I think it was all just a pretense, that I never loved you at all.'

Pan: A long time ago, in the underground realm, where there are no lies or pain, there lived a Princess who dreamed of the human world. She dreamed of blue skies, soft breeze, and sunshine. One day, eluding her keepers, the Princess escaped. Once outside, the brightness blinded her and erased every trace of the past from her memory. She forgot who she was and where she came from. Her body suffered cold, sickness, and pain. Eventually, she died. However, her father, the King, always knew that the Princess' soul would return, perhaps in another body, in another place, at another time. And he would wait for her, until he drew his last breath, until the world stopped turning... 


Oooooooooooooooh I so want to watch Pan's Labyrinth.
God I'm such a sucker for these kinds of film.
I swear I come from another realm.
Realm of Fairytales where I am Queen of ever lasting love.
Nod with me.
